name: Battle 4 Sky - Chibi
description:
New power-ups and user interfaces! ! !
Vivid sound effect and lifelike graphics! ! !
More realistic and thorough gaming experience! ! !
Don’t hesitate! Just download it!
Sky battle is a high-profile flight shooting game.
The most popular flight shooting game on android is here! ! !
It is not the same with this kind of games before! ! !

The story happens in outer space. The role combat with aliens to protect humans from attack.
This game is quite different from the raiden series and has been optimized .
The exciting and cool sound effect brings you a scene of gunfire licked the heavens.
There are two kinds of modes: one is themed on earth and the other universe.
You will be thrilled and excited to this space combat.


- Smooth game control
- Add different game scenes and power-ups!
- Vivid background music is in harmony with the game!
